title: Authenticate user
name: AuthUser
description: Used to authenticate user account by email and password.

title: Get user
name: GetUser
description: Used to get user account by ID.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "id": 1,
  "email": "test@test.com",
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Dow",
  "phone": "123123123",
  "dob": "1980-01-01",
  "logoFileId": 1,
  "isAgreedTerms": false,
  "isAgreedPromotions": false,
  "isNewUser": false,
  "link": "google.com",
  "position": "dev",
  "skype": "skypeLogin",
  "phone":"1234",
  "lang": "en",
  "active": true,
  "loggedInAt": "2017-03-02T19:31:27.000Z",
  "createdAt": "2017-03-02T19:31:27.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2017-03-02T19:31:27.000Z"
}

title: Get user document
